gw.document

Class DocumentsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentsUtilBase
      • gw.document.DocumentsUtil

  • public class DocumentsUtil
extends DocumentsUtilBase
    Document-related methods used in the ClaimCenter UI. Extends DocumentsUtilBase.
    Author:
    bjohnson

      • DocumentsUtil

    • Method Detail

      • claimHasDocuments

        public static boolean claimHasDocuments(Claim claim)
        Returns true if the claim has documents, false otherwise. Required because Claim.Documents might not be correct if there is an IDocumentMetadataSource implementation, since in that case documents are not stored in the ClaimCenter database, but are instead retrieved from the document management system.
        Parameters:
        claim - The claim being checked.
        Returns:
        true if the claim has documents, false otherwise.

      • getAllDocumentsForClaim

        public static Document[] getAllDocumentsForClaim(Claim claim)
        Retrieve the set of documents for the given claim. Required because Claim.Documents might not be correct if there is an IDocumentMetadataSource implementation, since in that case documents are not stored in the ClaimCenter database, but are instead retrieved from the document management system.
        Parameters:
        claim - The claim being checked.
        Returns:
        the set of documents linked to the given claim.

      • getVisibleDocumentSecurityTypesForUser

        public static java.util.List<DocumentSecurityType> getVisibleDocumentSecurityTypesForUser(User user)
        Return the document security types the given user is allowed to view
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be checked
        Returns:
        possibly empty list of document security types

      • getDocumentIcon

        public static java.lang.String getDocumentIcon(java.lang.String docUID,
                                               java.lang.Boolean dms,
                                               java.lang.String mimeType)
        Return the Icon for the document based on the docUID and the MimeType. This varies on the document content, i.e. if it is contentless or not. As well as the implementation for the IDMS and IDCS plugin, whether it uses the BaseLocal or the ServletBacked implementations. They treat the contentless document differently.
        Parameters:
        docUID - of the document
        dms - flag for the document
        mimeType - of the document
        Returns:
        Icon for this Document

      • getMimeTypeLabel

        public static java.lang.String getMimeTypeLabel(java.lang.String documentMimeType)
        Return the description of the MimeType of the selected document. This is based on the mimetypemapping's mimetype in the config.xml. If there is not a match, the MimeType is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        documentMimeType - Document's MimeType
        Returns:
        the Document's MimeType description, if any. Document's MimeType otherwise.

      • createDocumentCreationInfo

        public static DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo(Claim claim)
        Creates a new DocumentCreationInfo object, which is used by the Document creation screens to manage the document creation process.
        Parameters:
        claim - The Claim to which the newly created document will be linked.
        Returns:
        The newly created DocumentCreationInfo object.

      • createDocumentCreationInfo

        @Deprecated(value="Use createDocumentCreationInfo(Claim, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor) instead")
public static DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo(Claim claim,
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String templateId)
        Deprecated. Use createDocumentCreationInfo(Claim, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor) instead
        Creates a new DocumentCreationInfo object, which is used by the Document creation screens to manage the document creation process, based on the given template.
        Parameters:
        claim - The Claim to which the newly created document will be linked.
        templateId - The ID of the template which will be used to create the new document contents.
        Returns:
        The newly created DocumentCreationInfo object.

      • createDocumentCreationInfo

        public static DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo(Claim claim,
                                                              IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplate)
        Creates a new DocumentCreationInfo object, which is used by the Document creation screens to manage the document creation process, based on the given template.
        Parameters:
        claim - The Claim to which the newly created document will be linked.
        documentTemplate - The template which will be used to create the new document contents.
        Returns:
        The newly created DocumentCreationInfo object.

      • deleteDocumentWithoutCommitWithClaim

        public static void deleteDocumentWithoutCommitWithClaim(Document document,
                                                        Claim claim)
        This class takes in a document and the claim it belongs to, and removes the document using the claim's entity bundle. Useful in the new claim wizard.
        Parameters:
        document - Document to be removed
        claim - Claim which owns the document

      • deleteDocument

        public static void deleteDocument(Document document)
        Remove the given DocumentBase entity. Both the document contents and metadata will be removed; depending on whether there is a configured IDocumentMetadataSource implementation, the latter step may happen either in the database or in the document management system.
        Parameters:
        document - The DocumentBase entity to be removed from the ClaimCenter system.

      • getDocumentCreationParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getDocumentCreationParameters(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo)
        Builds the set of parameters which should be passed to one of the createDocument() methods on IDocumentProduction. Should only be used from the UI; from rules, build the Map directly in your Gosu.
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - The encapsulated state of the document creation process.
        Returns:
        A Map containing the values established by the current UI context.
